ruling: - [[Decayed Commander]]'s card-discarding effect only activates when [[Decayed Commander]] attacks directly AND deals 1 or more points of Battle Damage to the opponent, so if the opponent uses [[Kuriboh]] or [[Waboku]] then [[Decayed Commander]]'s effect does not activate.

- [[Decayed Commander]] does not activate its card-discarding effect if destroyed with [[Ring of Destruction]], or if it attacks a face-down monster while equipped with [[Fairy Meteor Crush]], or due to reflect damage from [[Relinquished]], etc.
